languages.text: "Отказано, ибо Восьмой параграф усердия гласит: "Взыскующий Знания да получит его в соответствии с рангом и допуском своими". Неведомое тебе моление сокрыто от мирян не без причины. Однако не будет тебе отказано в мудрости моей, ибо тяга к познанию угодна Омниссии".

"Denied, for it is said in the Eighth Article of Diligence, 'He who seeks Knowledge, let him receive it in accordance with his rank and admission.' The prayer that is unknown to you was hidden from laypeople for a reason. But you will not be denied my wisdom, for the Omnissiah looks favourably upon those who are drawn to knowledge."
languages.original_text: "Отказано, ибо Восьмой параграф усердия гласит: "Взыскующий Знания да получит его в соответствии с рангом и допуском своими". Неведомое тебе моление сокрыто от мирян не без причины. Однако не будет тебе отказано в мудрости моей, ибо тяга к познанию угодна Омниссии".

traits.locale_text: "Denied, for it is said in the Eighth Article of Diligence, 'Let seekers of Knowledge obtain it commensurate with their rank and access." The prayer that is unknown to you was hidden from laypeople for a reason. But you will not be denied my wisdom, for the Omnissiah looks favourably upon those who are drawn to knowledge."

The prayer that is unknown to you was hidden from laypeople for a reason. But you will not be denied my wisdom, for the Omnissiah looks favourably upon those who are drawn to knowledge."

The prayer that is unknown to you was hidden from laypeople for a reason. But you will not be denied my wisdom, for the Omnissiah looks favourably upon those who are drawn to knowledge."

The prayer that is unknown to you was hidden from laypeople for a reason. But you will not be denied my wisdom, for the Omnissiah looks favourably upon those who are drawn to knowledge."

languages.text: "Abgelehnt, denn im Achten Satz der Sorgfalt heißt es: 'Wer nach Wissen strebt, den lasst ihn es gemäß seines Rangs und seiner Zulassung empfangen.' Das Euch unbekannte Gebet wurde nicht ohne Grund vor Laien verborgen. Doch meine Weisheit wird Euch nicht vorenthalten bleiben, denn der Omnissiah blickt wohlwollend auf all jene, die vom Wissen angezogen werden."
languages.original_text: "Denied, for it is said in the Eighth Article of Diligence, 'He who seeks Knowledge, let him receive it in accordance with his rank and admission.' The prayer that is unknown to you was hidden from laypeople for a reason. But you will not be denied my wisdom, for the Omnissiah looks favourably upon those who are drawn to knowledge."

traits.locale_text: "Abgelehnt, denn im Achten Satz der Sorgfalt heißt es: 'Wer nach Wissen strebt, den lasst ihn es gemäß seines Rangs und seiner Zulassung empfangen.'" Das Euch unbekannte Gebet wurde nicht ohne Grund vor Laien verborgen. Doch meine Weisheit wird Euch nicht vorenthalten bleiben, denn der Omnissiah blickt wohlwollend auf all jene, die vom Wissen angezogen werden."

languages.text: « Non, car il est écrit dans le huitième article du Grimoire du Zèle : "Pour celui qui cherche la Connaissance, il convient qu'il la reçoive conformément à son rang et à son degré d'admission." Il y a une bonne raison pour laquelle cette prière, que vous ignorez, reste inconnue des profanes... Toutefois, je ne vous refuserai pas ma sagesse, car l'Omnimessie voit d'un œil favorable ceux qui se sentent attirés par la Connaissance. »
languages.original_text: "Denied, for it is said in the Eighth Article of Diligence, 'He who seeks Knowledge, let him receive it in accordance with his rank and admission.' The prayer that is unknown to you was hidden from laypeople for a reason. But you will not be denied my wisdom, for the Omnissiah looks favourably upon those who are drawn to knowledge."

traits.locale_text: « Non, car il est écrit dans le huitième article du Grimoire du Zèle : "Pour celui qui cherche la Connaissance, il convient qu'il la reçoive conformément à son rang et à son degré d'admission." Il y a une bonne raison pour laquelle cette prière, que vous ignorez, reste inconnue des profanes... Toutefois, je ne vous refuserai pas ma sagesse, car l'Omnimessie voit d'un œil favorable ceux qui se sentent attirés par la Connaissance. »

languages.text: “请求已拒绝。根据勤奋守则第八条，‘寻知之人，应遵照他的等级和权力来获取对应知识。’你不知晓祷词情有可原，因为外行人无法了解这些祷词。不过，我的智慧并不会将你拒之门外，因为欧姆尼塞亚青睐那些渴望知识之人。”
languages.original_text: "Denied, for it is said in the Eighth Article of Diligence, 'He who seeks Knowledge, let him receive it in accordance with his rank and admission.' The prayer that is unknown to you was hidden from laypeople for a reason. But you will not be denied my wisdom, for the Omnissiah looks favourably upon those who are drawn to knowledge."

traits.locale_text: “请求已拒绝。根据勤奋守则第八条，‘寻知之人，应遵照他的等级和权力来获取对应知识。’你不知晓祷词情有可原，因为外行人无法了解这些祷词。不过，我的智慧并不会将你拒之门外，因为欧姆尼塞亚青睐那些渴望知识之人。”

languages.text: 「断る。勤勉の第八節曰く、『知識を求める者在らば、位と承認に応じて其を授けよ』。お前が知らぬ祈祷文と言うが、理由があって部外者には秘されていたものだ。だが、お前は俺の英知を否定しないのだろう。万機神は知識に惹きつけられる者を好ましく見ておられるからな」
languages.original_text: "Denied, for it is said in the Eighth Article of Diligence, 'He who seeks Knowledge, let him receive it in accordance with his rank and admission.' The prayer that is unknown to you was hidden from laypeople for a reason. But you will not be denied my wisdom, for the Omnissiah looks favourably upon those who are drawn to knowledge."

traits.locale_text: 「断る。勤勉の第八節曰く、『知識を求める者在らば、位と承認に応じて其を授けよ』。お前が知らぬ祈祷文とは、理由があって部外者には秘されていたのだ。だが、お前は俺の英知を否定しないのだろう。万機神は知識に惹きつけられる者を好意的に見ておられるからな」

languages.text: «Negado, pues se dice en el Octavo Artículo de la Diligencia: "El que busca el Conocimiento, que lo reciba de acuerdo con su rango y admisión". La oración que desconoces se ocultó a los profanos por una razón. Pero no se te negará mi sabiduría, pues el Omnissiah ve con buenos ojos a los que se sienten atraídos por el conocimiento».
languages.original_text: "Denied, for it is said in the Eighth Article of Diligence, 'He who seeks Knowledge, let him receive it in accordance with his rank and admission.' The prayer that is unknown to you was hidden from laypeople for a reason. But you will not be denied my wisdom, for the Omnissiah looks favourably upon those who are drawn to knowledge."

traits.locale_text: «Negado, pues se dice en el Octavo Artículo de la Diligencia: "El que busca el Conocimiento, que lo reciba de acuerdo con su rango y admisión"». La oración que desconoces se ocultó a los profanos por una razón. Pero no se te negará mi sabiduría, pues el Omnissiah ve con buenos ojos a los que se sienten atraídos por el conocimiento».

languages.text: "Reddedildi. Zira Sekizinci Gayret Bendi, 'Kim ki İrfan arayışındadır, rütbesi ve yetkisine münhasır İrfana kavuşsun.' der. Aşina olmadığın duanın avamdan saklı olması, beyhude değildir. Lakin Hermesih'in İrfana yönelenlere lütfunu esirgememesindendir ki bilgeliğimden mahrum kalmayacaksın."
languages.original_text: "Denied, for it is said in the Eighth Article of Diligence, 'He who seeks Knowledge, let him receive it in accordance with his rank and admission.' The prayer that is unknown to you was hidden from laypeople for a reason. But you will not be denied my wisdom, for the Omnissiah looks favourably upon those who are drawn to knowledge."

traits.locale_text: "Reddedildi. Zira Sekizinci Gayret Bendi, 'kim ki İrfan arayışındadır, rütbesi ve yetkisine münhasır İrfan'a kavuşsun' der. Aşina olmadığın duanın avamdan saklı olması, beyhude değildir. Lakin Hermesih'in İrfan'a yönelenlere lütfunu esirgememesindendir ki bilgeliğimden mahrum kalmayacaksın."
